description:
freetype/truetype: add explicit graphics state.

These new opcodes aren't unit-tested per se, but they will be
exercised by an end-to-end hinting test of the Luxi fonts.

messages.text:
Hello bsiegert@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/freetype-go

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/12100043/diff/5001/freetype/truetype/hint.go
File freetype/truetype/hint.go (left):

https://codereview.appspot.com/12100043/diff/5001/freetype/truetype/hint.go#oldcode132
freetype/truetype/hint.go:132: // TODO: h.dv = h.pv ??
s/h/h.gs/

similarly below.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/freetype-go/source/detail?r=eaf11fb9761a ***

freetype/truetype: add explicit graphics state.

These new opcodes aren't unit-tested per se, but they will be
exercised by an end-to-end hinting test of the Luxi fonts.
